If you look at the "how to use guide" it says: "Choose a 'Username' & 'Serial'" which is what i did. Works perfectly! thank you ChattChitto.
Yeah this crack doesn't work.

First, do the mIRC setup.

I chose not to use automated cracking (always do things yourself) and instead clicked on 'mIRC v7.22 Crack' which prompts you with a window and where to save a file - save it to the desktop.

Find the install location of mIRC and replace the .exe in here with the one you just saved. Open up mIRC and go to help->register. Go back to the crack program and click on 'mIRC v7.22 Serials'.

Easy from there on out, enjoy and thank you ChattChitto for the upload :)

P.S. I assume that none of the above comments about serials not working are people who just went into serials and tried it with the latest program - the program actually verifies the serial online so this is why we have cracks people :) Always rely on a crack over a serial.

Great torrent as usual, Chatt. And nice music, too!

Just a note. The automated crack just copies the files over. You still have to register it with a username and serial... Don't forget that on Vista/7 you'll have to run ChattChitto's .exe as an administrator! But, yeah, verified that it works fine.

Steps to keep activated:

Install mIRC 7.22
Make sure mIRC is closed.
Crack the program manually
Open mIRC
Put in any username and code you want
Enjoy!
